replicas.i_am_not_admin: I don't have permission to ban.
replicas.you_are_not_admin: Nice try, but only admins can report spammers...
replicas.group_welcome: Hi there:) use /spam for reporting bad guys. For more info: /help. Developer: @kraftwerk28
replicas.rules:
/report - [admin] ban and report user
/voteban - start voteban
/stop - [admin] start voteban cooldown
replicas.private_messsages_restriction: I am only for groups and supergroups.
